NNClass module¶

This module trains DNNs(Deep Neural Networks) on Tensorflow, using player’s own game play data as the training data. It also predicts the movements of the player from observing the current status of the game using the DNN.

Project : Bomberman Bot with Machine Learning Olin College Software Design Final Orject, Spring 2017 By : TEAM AFK

class NNClass.myClassifier(trainName, saveStateName)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class handles all the Neural Network operations for the bomberman including : 1) training 2) prediction 3) weight visualization

get_test_inputs()[source]¶

helper function that feeds data to the classifier

get_train_inputs()[source]¶

helper function that feeds data to the classifier

predict(myInput)[source]¶

Return probability values that represent the prediction

returnvar()[source]¶

Returns the expected overall weight of each node on the neural network as a whole. This is hightly specialized for the current machine learning configuration and will therefore not work if any parameters change

testAccuracy(testName)[source]¶

Takes a csv file as input to test the accuracy of the model

trainModel(steps)[source]¶

Trains the model for a given number of iterations. The model must first be trained before predictions can be made, so it is possible to train it 0 times in order to load a modelwithout changes

NNClass.my_input_fn(input)[source]¶
